document.masterDocTitle: Checklist and distribution of the family Notonectidae in Romania, with the first record of Notonecta maculata Fabricius, 1794 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 15. Present distribution of
Anisops sardeus sardeus Herrich-Schaeffer, 1849
(dot),
Notonecta maculata Fabricius, 1794
(star),
N . meridionalis Poisson, 1923
(square), and
N. lutea M√ºller, 1776
(triangle) in Romania. Solid shapes represent the published records, blank shapes represent the new records.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Notes. Sympatric with
N. glauca glauca
, but several specimens were also collected along with
N. meridionalis (
Berchi et al . 2012
)
. Aspects of the hemelytral coloration pattern and the paramere are illustrated in
Figs. 7, 8
and
12
.

caption.paragraph: TABLE 1. Checklist of the Notonectidae of Romania, with species occurrences in the neighboring countries (after So√≥s 1963; Josifov 1986, 1999; Kis & Davidescu 1994; Putshkov & Putshkov 1996; Derzhansky 1997; Protiƒã 1998; Berchi 2011; Berchi et al. 2012). Abbreviations: RO=Romania, RS=Republic of Serbia (including Kosovo), HU=Hungary, UA=Ukraine, MD=Republic of Moldova, BG=Bulgaria.
